boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) is a board game in which one player takes on the role of the treacherous overlord, and up to four other players take on the roles of courageous heroes. During each game, the heroes embark on quests and venture into dangerous caves, ancient ruins, dark dungeons, and cursed forests to battle monsters, earn riches, and attempt to stop the overlord from carrying out his vile plot._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;With danger lurking in every shadow, combat is a necessity. For such times, Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) uses a unique dice-based system. Players build their dice pools according to their character's abilities and weapons, and each die in the pool contributes to an attack in different ways. Surges, special symbols that appear on most dice, also let you trigger special effects to make the most of your attacks. And with the horrors awaiting you beneath the surface, you'll need every advantage you can take..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Featuring double-sided modular board pieces, countless hero and skill combinations, and an immersive story-driven campaign, Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) transports heroes to a vibrant fantasy realm where they must stand together against an ancient evil._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Compared to the first edition of Descent: Journeys in the Dark, this game features:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Simpler rules for determining line of sight _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Faster setup of each encounter_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Defense dice to mitigate the tendency to _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;math out_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; attacks_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Shorter quests with plenty of natural stopping points_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Cards that list necessary statistics, conditions, and effects_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A new mechanism for controlling the overlord powers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Enhanced hero selection and creation process_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Experience system to allow for hero growth and development_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Out-of-the-box campaign system_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Descent 1st edition Conversion Kit _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Descent: Journeys in the Dark (second edition) – Conversion Kit_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Fantasy Flight Games (FFGDJ01) Descent: Journeys in the Dark Second Edition is a board game in which one player takes on the role of the treacherous overlord, and up to four other players take on the roles of courageous heroes. Featuring double-sided modular board pieces, countless hero and skill combinations, and an immersive story-driven campaign, Descent: Journeys in the Dark Second Edition transports heroes to a vibrant fantasy realm where they must stand together against an ancient evil. This updated version of the classic board game of dungeon-delving adventure features a host of enhancements, including new heroes and monsters, streamlined rules, a class-based hero system, campaign play, and much more.

All the expansions including the base game would cost around 800 Euros if bought new - not includig the sleeves and boxes for the cards. ; ) Das Spiel wurde nur wenige Male gespielt, ist also fast unbenutzt und neuwertig. Aus Platzgründen wurden die Inlays aus den Schachteln entfernt und alle Erweiterungen finden sich in den auf den Fotos abgebildeten Boxen. Die restlichen Kartons gibt es leider nicht mehr. Wie man am Foto auch erkennen kann, sind fast alle Karten gesleeved und die restlichen Komponenten gut sortiert verpackt. Alle inkludierten Erweiterungen inkl. dem Grundspiel würden insgesamt um die 800 Euro neu kosten - und da sind die Sleeves und Kartons für die Karten noch gar nicht dabei. ; )
